title: AI/ML Testing Strategy
shortDescription: Design comprehensive testing strategy for ML models covering accuracy, bias, robustness, and production validation.

inputs.label: Model Type
inputs.example: Multi-modal transformer for document understanding (vision + NLP)

inputs.label: Critical Outcomes
inputs.example: Financial field extraction accuracy - errors cause payment issues and compliance risk

inputs.label: Known Edge Cases
inputs.example: Handwritten notes, poor scan quality, multi-column layouts, non-standard formats

inputs.label: Regulatory Requirements
inputs.example: GDPR (no PII leakage), SOC 2 (audit trails), EU AI Act (bias documentation)
